bibl.title: Chung Him and Seid Yam v. Henry M. White. Admission of Service of Petition for Appeal, Etc.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: The District Court of the United States, Western District of Washington, Northern Division

div1.p: In the District Court of the United States for the Western District of Washington.
Northern Division.
In the Matter of the Application of Chung Him and Seid Yam, for a Writ of Habeas Corpus.
Henry M. White, as Commissioner of Immigration, Respondent.
Admission of Service of Petition for Appeal, Etc.
Filed in the United States District Court
Western District of Washington
Northern Division
Tx
F.M. Harshberger, Clerk
By S.E. Leitch Deputy
Admission of Service of Petition for Appeal, Etc.
In the Matter of the Application of Chung Him and Seid Yam, for a Writ of Habeas Corpus.
Henry M. White, as Commissioner of Immigration, Respondent.

Due, timely and regular service, together with the receipt of copies thereof, of the Respondent's petition for an order allowing an appeal, and of the order allowing the appeal, and of the citation on appeal issued pursuant to said order, is hereby admitted, this 6th day of December January, 1921.
J. L Corrigan
Attorney for Chung Him and Seid Yam, petitioners.
